item.title: Residents using playground bin as private bin, 28th October
item.description:
Residents use the playground bin as their private one. It had been cleaned in the morning by the council but someone filled it up with their own non bag and even electricals. Very disrespectful. Please find and fine these people who do this regularly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ambleside Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of rubbish dumped on the edge of the traveller site over the road from the cafe, 28th October
item.description:

item.title: Illegal parking, 28th October
item.description:
This person keeps parking his car in my driveway. He blocks the driveway and causes a lot of inconvenience for us and our neighbors. We can't put the trash cans away and my neighbor can't park because he thinks it's ours, even though we don't own or drive a car.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Wagtail Way, St Paul's Cray, London
